title: Hare Rama Hare Krishna Lyrics Poda Podi Lyrics

Exact translation of tamil words

Yaar nee friend-ah no fling-ah no illa
ennaku nee yaar kanava no uravaa no illa

kadhal endru sonnaaley 
kadhil vandhu sonnaaley
kadhal endru sonnaaley yea yeah  ..

kadhal endru solveney
kadhil vandhu solveney
kadhal endru solveney  yea yeah ..

hare rama hare krishna save my love
hare rama hare krishna save my love
hare rama …hare krishna..
kanji kanji ketkuren save my love  (2)

Naan unnai podi endraalum
meendum nee odi varuvaaye
cute-ah oru mutham thandhaale
podhum…

kandhal nee indru unnai naan
wife alga convert seiya thaan
naan edho mindful selkindren
oh .. yeah .

chinna chinna sandaigalai podaadhey
kandhal vandha joril scene podaadhey
kallaanaalum, pullaanaalum
ennudaya boy friend neethaaney

Yaar nee friend-ah no fling-ah no illa
ennaku nee yaar uravaa no kanaava no illa

neeyum naanum serndhaale 
naatkal lodi pathaadhey
podhum endru thonaadhey.. yeah ..yeah ..

kadhal endru sonnaaley (2)
kadhil vandhu sonnaaley (2)
meendum ennul vandhaaley (2)  yea yeah  ..
